about_the_game:
Autumn Leaves is a text-based management game set in a fantasy world long since stuck in the autumn season.

The game will have you build a town and protect it for 90 days as you learn about the world and it's characters.

Features:

  • Build a town from scratch.
  • Protect it from raiders and enemy factions.
  • Meet an eccentric cast of characters and watch them grow.
  • Harvest and process resources, build structures, research technology, etc.
  • Original soundtrack and hand drawn art.
  • Made by one person.

Please don't let the screenshots intimidate you, the game is much simpler than it looks.

name: Autumn Leaves

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz+
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: An artsy, text-based, fantasy management game. Not as difficult as it looks.
